medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days ago, progressively worsening with nausea, chills, and diarrhea. Patient had a temperature of 99.9 at home on the day of admission. Reports having had similar symptoms 30 days ago, which were less severe and self-limiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Two colonic polyps (benign polyps), left hip labral tear, right infiltrating ductal breast cancer (grade 1 LVI negative/ER positive) status post resection and latissimus reconstruction, recurrence treated with XRT and Femara, indeterminate palpitations, hyperlipidemia, hypothyroidism, IBS, osteopenia, GERD, HTN, endometriosis.
